version.description: The schema version to be used

type.description: The type of this message, used for further validation of the message body.

message.description: The actual body of this message or the place where to find it.

oneOf.description: An object describing the contents of this message.
The URI pointing to the messages location in case it was stored out of band.

created_at.description: The producer issued timestamp specifying when the message was created.

sequence.description: Optional value that may be set by a producer to assist consumers in case that order is of importance
